Imparfait (Imperfect).J'entrais: I used to go in, I used to enter
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu entrais: You used to go in, You used to enter
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle entrait: He/She used to go in, He/She used to enter
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous entrions: We used to go in, We used to enter
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous entriez: You used to go in, You used to enter (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles entraient: They used to go in, They used to enter

Futur simple (Simple Future).J'entrerai: I will go in, I will enter
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu entreras: You will go in, You will enter
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle entrera: He/She will go in, He/She will enter
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous entrerons: We will go in, We will enter
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous entrerez: You will go in, You will enter (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles entreront: They will go in, They will enter
